The Robot Arm Challenge 2025 is a bin-picking robotics competition where participants will build a fully automated system capable of sorting items of different shapes, colors, and sizes within a given time. Hosted by the HKU Armstrong Team at Tam Wing Fan Innovation Wing One, HKU, this competition provides an exciting platform for students to apply their robotics and AI skills in a real-world challenge.
